GeDBIT.type

类 Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • GeDBIT.type.Table
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    DoubleVectorTable, ImageTable, SequenceTable, SpectraTable, SpectraWithPrecursorMassTable, StringTable

    public abstract class Table
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a set of data points in a database, including it's corresponding metric and any indexes that have been built over it.
    作者:
    Willard, Rui Mao
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格
